overview: A documentary about Wieslaw Janiszyn, known on the Internet as Wieslaw Wszywka. Thanks to his naturalness in front of the camera and charisma, Mr Wieslaw achieved quite a popularity, leading the program entitled 'Kopsnij Drina' in which he tested various alcohols. The film is a kind of a memorial to Mr Wieslaw, who died on October 15th 2021.
title: Kopsnij drina
